description: A collection of circles in a thin, vertical rectangular formation with a rounded bottom and another rectangular formation of circles extending upward diagonally from the right side of the first formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a green triangle in the center of the vertical rectangular formation and a light blue triangle at the bottom of the diagonal rectangular formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
